snippet.title: Eleven miles
snippet.description: 'Mom, do many kids do this?' The Boy asked me, after something like the zillionth adult cyclist passed by. 'Do what, ride bikes here?' I asked. 'Yes, ride bikes, and for this far,' he replied. I looked to my right. The ...

snippet.title: Video Game Review: Ace Attorney Investigations: Miles Edgeworth
snippet.description: Courtroom drama shows blood at crime scene in snapshots.

snippet.title: DVD Review: The Green Mile
snippet.description: Thoughtful, intelligent movie for older teens.

snippet.title: DVD Review: American Pie Presents: The Naked Mile
snippet.description: Another raunchy race toward the first time; adults only.

snippet.title: Television Review: The 100-Mile Challenge
snippet.description: Reality docu is a mix of information and product promotion.

snippet.title: Book Review: Miles to Go
snippet.description: Miley shares her life 'so far.' Fluffy, but fun for fans.

snippet.title: DVD Review: 8 Mile
snippet.description: Eminem's edgy, graphic quasi-biopic is not for kids.

snippet.title: DVD Review: 3000 Miles to Graceland
snippet.description: Extremely violent Elvis-based robbery for 17+ only.

snippet.title: Walking a Mile in Their Shoes
snippet.description: It's true that our dermatologist might have a personality disorder. Once, for example, when he was grimly writing me a prescription for my umpteenth tube of hydrocortiscam for the umpteenth lump, bump, cyst, pustule, bo...

snippet.title: Coeur d'Alene, Idaho | Mile-a-Minute Escapades in Idaho's Panhandle
snippet.description: A natural wonderland, Coeur d'Alene's glacial lake, lush mountain forests, numerous hike and bike trails and nearby skiing add up to an outdoorsy retreat any season; throw in a charming downtown and a whimsical animated...
